item.title: Admin only weapons?
item.dc:creator: @tehscapeee tehscapeee
item.description:
@tehscapeee wrote:

Hmm Well that did’nt work. then I noticed this:

resetItems(3214); // THIS MIGHT STOP CLIENT HACKS HMM? targetSlot = itemType(wearID); int CLAttack = GetCLAttack(wearID); int CLPrayer = GetCLPrayer(wearID); int CLFletching = GetCLFletching(wearID); int CLWoodcutting = GetCLWoodcutting(wearID); int CLCooking = GetCLCooking(wearID); int CLFishing = GetCLFishing(wearID); int CLThieving = GetCLThieving(wearID); int CLHitpoints = GetCLHitpoints(wearID); int CLAgility = GetCLFarming(wearID); int CLSlayer = GetCLSlayer(wearID); int CLDefence = GetCLDefence(wearID); int CLStrength = GetCLStrength(wearID); int CLMagic = GetCLMagic(wearID); int CLRanged = GetCLRanged(wearID); int CLPkpoints = GetCLPkpoints(wearID); int CLrights = GetCLrights(wearID); boolean GoFalse = false;

So I added ClRights to it.

Now this error comes up:

client.java:16102: cannot find symbol symbol : variable rights location: class client if (rights - CLrights < 0) { ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Admin only weapons?
item.dc:creator: @tehscapeee tehscapeee
item.description:
@tehscapeee wrote:

Well there is a couple weapons on my source that you need a certain amount of Pk Points to equip. I tried making one myself but I couldn’t figure it out.

Here is the code for the pk points weapon.

if (pkpoints - CLPkpoints < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLPkpoints + " pk points to equip this item. You currently have " + pkpoints + " pk points"); GoFalse = true; }

Then it is linked to the weapons like this

public int GetCLPkpoints(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 5553) { return 100; } if (ItemID == 5555) { return 250; } if (ItemID == 7449) { return 500; } return 0; }

Anyone have any ideas?

This is what I tried:

if (rights - CLRights < 0) { sendMessage( "You need " + CLRights + " rights to equip this item. You need to be an admin"); GoFalse = true; }

public int GetCLRights(int ItemID) { if (ItemID == 746) { return 3; } if (ItemID == 747) { return 3; } if (ItemID == 5700) { return 3; } if (ItemID == 5702) { return 3; } return 0; }

And I got this when trying to compile:

client.java:16101: cannot find symbol symbol : variable rights location: class client if (rights - CLRights < 0) { ^ client.java:16101: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CLRights location: class client if (rights - CLRights < 0) { ^ client.java:16103: cannot find symbol symbol : variable CLRights location: class client "You need " + CLRights + " rights to equip this item. Yo u need to be an admin"); ^ Note: stream.java uses or overrides a deprecated API. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:deprecation for details. 3 errors Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic
